name: Sick Nasty!
description:
Are you hardcore?

How hardcore?

Hardcore enough to survive Sick Nasty? Time to put your hardcore awesomeness to the test. Surf & pull off radical stunts while using your voice to create like, totally bogus waves.

This gnarly game was a totally bodacious entry for Global Game Jam 2017.

FYI dude, you like need a mic or gamepad to play.

Totally Tenacious Team:

Caolan Radford - Code

Chris McHugh - Code

Conor Buckley - Audio

Glen Noctor - 3D Art, Animation

Niall Ainsworth - Code, 2D Art

Niall O'Colmain - Code, Voice Acting

Ruth O'Donoghue - 2D Art
